title: US–JP Credit Externalization Study: Code, Processed Data, and Figures (2025Q3)
description: Reproducible code and selected processed datasets for the US–Japan credit externalization analysis. Includes figure generation scripts (fig_codeNN), processing pipelines (proc_codeNN), and documentation. See README for data provenance and reproducibility notes.
notes: If the associated paper DOI becomes available, add it under related_identifiers with relation 'isSupplementTo'.
